revision.comment: Rescuing 1 sources and tagging 0 as dead. #IABot (v2.0beta14)
revision.text: ==Yidgha== ===Etymology=== Related to {{m|mnj|yowga}}. ===Noun=== {{head|ydg|noun}} # [[water]] ===References=== * [https://web.archive.org/web/20170302145025/http://www.amelotti.tu1.ru/IE_table.html]<!--need better reference--> (as ''yaugh'') * Kendall D. Decker, ''[http://www.sil.org/sociolx/pubs/32850_SSNP05.pdf Languages of Chitral]'', (1992, Sociolinguistic Survey of Northern Pakistan, 5. Islamabad: National Institute of Pakistan Studies, Quaid-i-Azam University and Summer Institute of Linguistics, xxii), page 185 (as ''yʌɣo'')
